ISSUE.TITLE: AR2 Add a check for Raw = 0 if triggering a notification just off of raw
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If `AR2_USE_RAW=true` and using MQTT which on the rare occasion misses raw data, when raw data is missing it triggers a notification stating that Raw BG: 0 mg/dl we should add a check to AR2 notifications if only triggering based off of raw and Raw BG = 0 to ignore it and not generate notifications.
